pageContext.claim: “When you are the ‘Piggy Bank’ Nation that foreign countries have been robbing and deceiving for years, the word TARIFF is a beautiful word indeed! Others must treat the United States fairly and with respect - We are no longer the ‘fools’ of the past!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump does not understand or purposefully misrepresents how international trade works. Countries do not lose money on trade or "rob" each other. Trade balances simply reflect what consumers in one country chose to buy from a second country.
